field.description: The path of the form element in the data object (required for the data item)
field.description_zh: 表单元素在数据对象中的path（数据项必填）

show-colon.description: Whether or not to display a colon

no-style.description: Whether or not to remove the style

asterisk-position.description: Optionally place an asterisk before/after the label
asterisk-position.description_zh: 可选择将星号置于 label 前/后

:rules.description: Form item validation rules (rules that take precedence over form)
:rules.description_zh: 表单项校验规则（优先级高于 form 的 rules）

validate-trigger.description: The event that triggers the check

:label-col-props.description: Label element layout options. The parameters <col> are the same as those of the component
:label-col-props.description_zh: 标签元素布局选项。参数同 <col> 组件一致

:wrapper-col-props.description: Form control layout options. The parameters <col> are the same as those of the component
:wrapper-col-props.description_zh: 表单控件布局选项。参数同 <col> 组件一致

:label-col-style.description: The style of the label element layout component
:label-col-style.description_zh: 标签元素布局组件的 style

:wrapper-col-style.description: The style of the form control layout component
:wrapper-col-style.description_zh: 表单控件布局组件的 style

:row-props.description: Form item layout options. The parameters <row> are the same as those of the component
:row-props.description_zh: 表单项布局选项。参数同 <row> 组件一致

row-class.description: The class of the form item layout component
row-class.description_zh: 表单项布局组件的 class

content-class.description: The class of the form control wrapper
content-class.description_zh: 表单控件包裹层的 class

content-flex.description: Whether the content layer has flex layout enabled
content-flex.description_zh: 内容层是否开启 flex 布局

merge-props.description: (Deprecated) controls the props passed to the child element. By default, extra properties on disabled, error, size, events, and FormItem are included. Version 2.18.0 is repealed
merge-props.description_zh: （已废除）控制传递到子元素上的 Props。默认包括 disabled、error、size、 events 和 FormItem 上的额外属性。2.18.0 版本废除

label-col-flex.description: Sets the flex properties of the label COL component. When set, the flex property of the form COL component is set to auto.
label-col-flex.description_zh: 设置标签 Col 组件的 flex 属性。设置时表单 Col 组件的 flex 属性会被设置为 auto。

feedback.description: Whether to display the feedback icon for the form control
feedback.description_zh: 是否显示表单控件的反馈图标

label-component.description: The element rendered by the form item label
label-component.description_zh: 表单项标签渲染的元素

:label-attrs.description: The attribute of the form item element

FieldRule.name: type
FieldRule.description: 校验的值的类型，默认为 'string'

FieldRule.name: message
FieldRule.description: 校验失败时展示的信息

FieldRule.name: includes
FieldRule.description: 数组中是否包含给定值（array）

FieldRule.name: hasKeys
FieldRule.description: 对象是否包含给定属性（object）

FieldRule.name: validator
FieldRule.type: ( value: FieldValue | undefined, callback: (error?: string) => void ) => void
